name: Assize
help:
Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 1,500
Additional Effect: Restores 2,500 MP
Additional Effect: Reduces Assize recast time by a percentage corresponding to the number of healing Lilies stacked at time of action execution (at which time the Lilies are removed)

1 Lily: 10%
2 Lilies: 25%
3 Lilies: 50%
